Controlling the Chronicle Desktop Utility
#include <Chronicle/Chronicle.h>
Chronicle::Error err;
err = Chronicle::Facade::showUtility();
err = Chronicle::Facade::openWebsite();
err = Chronicle::Facade::openFAQ();
